ca.team3161.lib.utils.io

Class DriverStationLCD

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.team3161.lib.utils.io.DriverStationLCD

  • public final class DriverStationLCD
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide access to LCD on the Driver Station.

      • println

        public void println(int line,
           java.lang.String text)
        Print formatted text to the Driver Station LCD text buffer. Messages which are too long will be truncated.
        Parameters:
        line - The line on the LCD to print to.
        text - the text to print
